[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [composeTechniqueTextureName](./harp-datasource-protocol.composetechniquetexturename.md)

## composeTechniqueTextureName() function

Compose full texture name for given image name with technique specified. Some techniques allows to add prefix/postfix to icons names specified, this function uses technique information to create fully qualified texture name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function composeTechniqueTextureName(imageName: string, technique: PoiTechnique | LineMarkerTechnique): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageName | string | base name of the marker icon. |
|  technique | [PoiTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitechnique.md) \| [LineMarkerTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.linemarkertechnique.md) | the technique describing POI or line marker. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

fully qualified texture name for loading from atlas (without extension).
